name: Bagel and Cream Cheese
subtitle: Classic morning favorite
description: A toasted whole grain bagel with smooth cream cheese, served with fresh greens, tomato slices, and a boiled egg.

name: Breakfast Sandwich
subtitle: Energy booster combo
description: A hearty sandwich with eggs, fruits, toast, and a colorful variety of vegetables to start your day right.

name: Baked Chicken
subtitle: Savory protein-packed meal
description: Tender baked chicken topped with crispy bacon on a bed of seasoned veggies and creamy mashed potatoes.

name: Eggs Benedict
subtitle: Classic egg breakfast
description: Perfectly poached eggs on toasted muffins, layered with bacon and topped with hollandaise sauce.

name: Toast Croissant Fried Egg
subtitle: Deluxe breakfast plate
description: A mix of croissant toast, ham, and sunny-side-up eggs with a creamy dipping sauce.

name: Full Breakfast Fried Egg Toast Brunch
subtitle: Affordable full plate
description: A hearty mix of scrambled eggs, toast, sausage, and grilled tomato – perfect for brunch lovers.

name: Healthy Meal Plan
subtitle: Nutritious & balanced
description: Grilled chicken breast served with sautéed vegetables, fresh greens, and a tangy side of tomato dip.

name: Fried Chicken Bento
subtitle: Quick lunch combo
description: A tasty bento box with crispy fried chicken, golden fries, and creamy coleslaw.

name: Tarragon-Rubbed Salmon
subtitle: Light & herby delight
description: Pan-seared salmon rubbed with tarragon, served with sautéed greens and cherry tomatoes.

name: Indian Lunch
subtitle: Desi flavors on a plate
description: Traditional Indian lunch with curry, rice, dal, salad, and papad – all in one combo plate.

name: Beef Steak
subtitle: Western lunch special
description: Juicy grilled beef steak with rich gravy, bell peppers, cherry tomatoes, and greens.

name: Honey-Soy-Glazed Salmon with Peppers
subtitle: Asian-inspired flavors
description: Tender salmon glazed in a sweet soy sauce, served with bell peppers and fresh herbs.

name: Salmon with Grapefruit and Lentil Salad
subtitle: Zesty & fresh
description: Grilled salmon fillet paired with citrus grapefruit and lentil salad for a tangy healthy dinner.

name: Lemony Salmon Piccata
subtitle: Mediterranean delight
description: Zesty lemon-glazed salmon served on a bed of garden-fresh vegetables and herbs.

name: Beef Tenderloin With Quinoa Pilaf
subtitle: Protein-rich gourmet
description: Juicy beef tenderloin served with colorful quinoa pilaf and fresh leafy greens.

name: French Fries with Cheese
subtitle: Cheesy comfort food
description: Crispy French fries topped with melted cheese, spices, and creamy dressing.

name: Garlic Butter Baked Salmon
subtitle: Simple & savory
description: Baked salmon fillets drizzled with garlic butter and served with greens and lemon wedges.

name: Baked Chicken
subtitle: Evening classic
description: Seasoned baked chicken served with a mix of vegetables and light creamy sauce.
